page.title: 20TRANSPORT IN BADENOCH
page.content: Although Kingussie was{by-passed}by the A9 trunk road in 1979, the new road provides easy access for residents to shopping facilities in Inverness and Perth. {Tourism}is a main industry in this area and is assisted by greatly improved road links with the south. {High speed {buses}compete with the train service for passengers and are ever increasing in popularity due to the economy and comfort offered. At the time Kingussie was by-passed bus transport consisted of two buses northbound and two southbound weekly. Nowadays there is a choice of twelve per day each way! {Train services}have also improved with the use of the High Speed 125 train and of updated rolling stock. London can be reached in seven hours.
